com.functions

Class ExaminationFunction

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.functions.ExaminationFunction

  • public class ExaminationFunction
extends java.lang.Object
    ExaminationFunction class contains all functions needed tp Examen Object
    This class contains 9 public functions and 6 private functions
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    C.DEBAISIEUX

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private static java.util.ArrayList<Examen> temporaryList
      ArrayList<Examen> temporaryList is used for temporary extraction and display of Examination informations

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      ExaminationFunction() 

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static void cancelInformationBeforeAddExamination(com.toedter.calendar.JDateChooser examinationDateField, javax.swing.JTextField patientNumberExamPanelField, javax.swing.JComboBox examinationTypeSelection)
      this function is used to all the field of the following parameters
      static void changeInfoExamination(javax.swing.JList list, java.util.ArrayList<Examen> arrayExamination, java.util.ArrayList<Patient> arrayPatient, javax.swing.JTextField patientNumberExamPanelField, javax.swing.JComboBox examinationTypeSelection, com.toedter.calendar.JDateChooser examinationDateField)
      this function is used to change the informations of an Examen
      The function used is related to the state of the temporaryList if the temporaryList is empty changeInfoExaminationFronArrayExamination() if put in action else changeInfoExaminationFromTemporaryList() is used
      private static void changeInfoExaminationFromTemporaryList(javax.swing.JList list, java.util.ArrayList<Examen> arrayExamination, java.util.ArrayList<Patient> arrayPatient, javax.swing.JTextField patientNumberExamPanelField, javax.swing.JComboBox examinationTypeSelection, com.toedter.calendar.JDateChooser examinationDateField)
      this function is used to change the informations of an Examen from the temporaryList
      The index of the row selected in the graphic list is registered, if the result of the selected index equals -1 the function isn't executed The informations in the fields are checked Then the Examen stored at the selected index in the temporaryList is extracted and it's values updated The temporaryList is cleared Finally the updated arrayExamination is displayed in the JList
      private static void changeInfoExaminationFronArrayExamination(javax.swing.JList list, java.util.ArrayList<Examen> arrayExamination, java.util.ArrayList<Patient> arrayPatient, javax.swing.JTextField patientNumberExamPanelField, javax.swing.JComboBox examinationTypeSelection, com.toedter.calendar.JDateChooser examinationDateField)
      this function is used to change the informations of an Examen from the arrayExamination
      The index of the row selected in the graphic list is registered, if the result of the selected index equals -1 the function isn't executed The informations in the fields are checked Then the Examen stored at the selected index in the arrayExamination is extracted and it's values udpated Finally the updated arrayExamination is displayed in the JList
      static void creatExamination(javax.swing.JList listExaminationPanel, javax.swing.JList switchRoomAndExaminationList, java.util.ArrayList<Patient> arrayPatient, java.util.ArrayList<Examen> arrayExamination, javax.swing.JTextField patientNumberExamPanelField, javax.swing.JComboBox examinationTypeSelection, com.toedter.calendar.JDateChooser examinationDateField)
      this function is used to create an Examen object
      before the creation of the Examen all the field are check then the Patient for whom this Examen is instantiate is extract from the arrayPatient The examination's informations are displayed in the JList Finally the fields are cleared automatically of the previous informations
      static void deleteExamination(javax.swing.JList list, java.util.ArrayList<Examen> arrayExamination, javax.swing.JTextField patientNumberExamPanelField, javax.swing.JComboBox examinationTypeSelection, com.toedter.calendar.JDateChooser examinationDateField, javax.swing.JList switchRoomAndExaminationList, javax.swing.JList bookedList)
      this function is used to delete an Examen
      The function used is related to the state of the temporaryList if the temporaryList is empty deleteFromArrayExamination() if put in action else deleteFromTemporaryList() is used
      private static void deleteFromArrayExamination(javax.swing.JList list, java.util.ArrayList<Examen> arrayExamination, javax.swing.JTextField patientNumberExamPanelField, javax.swing.JComboBox examinationTypeSelection, com.toedter.calendar.JDateChooser examinationDateField, javax.swing.JList switchRoomAndExaminationList, javax.swing.JList bookedList)
      this function is used to delete an Examen
      The index of the row selected in the graphic list is registered, if the result of the selected index equals -1 the function isn't executed Before deleting an Examen it is imperative to check if a Chambre has already been booked for this one If no room has been booked : - The the selected index is used to remove the Examen stored in the index of the arrayExamination - The RoomFunction.updadeExaminationListForBooking() is used
      Else if a room has been registered - The room is cloned - The RoomFunction.resetRoomDataToDefault() is put in action - The the selected index is used to remove the Examen stored in the index of the arrayExamination - The RoomFunction.updadeExaminationListForBooking() is used - The RoomFunction.printRoomInList() is used too After that the fields are cleared The updated arrayExamination is displayed in the graphic list
      private static void deleteFromTemporaryList(javax.swing.JList list, java.util.ArrayList<Examen> arrayExamination, javax.swing.JTextField patientNumberExamPanelField, javax.swing.JComboBox examinationTypeSelection, com.toedter.calendar.JDateChooser examinationDateField, javax.swing.JList switchRoomAndExaminationList, javax.swing.JList bookedList)
      this function is used to delete an Examen
      The index of the row selected in the graphic list is registered, if the result of the selected index equals -1 the function isn't executed The Examen at the selected index is extracted of the temporaryList A loop is used to check all the Examen stored in the arrayExamination The value of all Examen are checked and to find the one selected by the user After it has been found and before deleting it, it is imperative to check if a Chambre has already been booked for this one If no room has been booked : - The selected index is used to remove the Examen stored in the index of the arrayExamination - The RoomFunction.updadeExaminationListForBooking() is used
      Else if a room has been registered - The room is cloned - The RoomFunction.resetRoomDataToDefault() is put in action - The the selected index is used to remove the Examen stored in the index of the arrayExamination - The RoomFunction.updadeExaminationListForBooking() is used - The RoomFunction.printRoomInList() is used too The Examen at the selected index is removed of the temporaryList After that the fields are cleared The updated arrayExamination is displayed in the graphic list
      static Examen extractExaminationFromArray(java.util.ArrayList<Examen> arrayExamination, int idP)
      this function is used extract an Examen from arrayExamination with only the ID of the Patient
      In a loop when the id Patient is found the loop is stopped The examination is returned
      static Examen extractExaminationFromArray(java.util.ArrayList<Examen> arrayExamination, int idP, java.lang.String examinationType, java.lang.String examinationDate)
      this function is used extract an Examen from arrayExamination with only the ID of the Patient
      In a loop when the id Patient, the type of examination and the date of the examination are found the loop is stopped The examination is returned
      static void searchExamination(javax.swing.JList list, java.util.ArrayList<Examen> arrayExamination, javax.swing.JTextField searchExaminationField)
      this function is used to look for informations related to Examen objects
      Clearing the temporaryList is needed before each research A loop is used to check in each Examen object if the key work is registered in the fields If a result is found the Examen is stored in the temporaryList Finally the result is shown by the JList if the temporaryList is empty there is no results so it display the informations of the arrayExamination else it display the result(s) stored in the temporaryList
      static void showExamination(javax.swing.JList list, java.util.ArrayList<Examen> arrayExamination, javax.swing.JTextField patientNumberExamPanelField, javax.swing.JComboBox examinationTypeSelection, com.toedter.calendar.JDateChooser examinationDateField)
      this function is used to put the information of an Examen object in the graphic field
      The function used is related to the state of the temporaryList if the temporaryList is empty showExaminationFromArrayExamination() if put in action else showExaminationFronTemporaryList() is used
      private static void showExaminationFromArrayExamination(javax.swing.JList list, java.util.ArrayList<Examen> arrayExamination, javax.swing.JTextField patientNumberExamPanelField, javax.swing.JComboBox examinationTypeSelection, com.toedter.calendar.JDateChooser examinationDateField)
      this function is used to put the information of an Examen object in the graphic field
      If the result of the selected index equals -1 the isn't executed the Examen stored at the selected index is extracted from the arrayExamination the information are dispatched in the related graphic fields component
      private static void showExaminationFronTemporaryList(javax.swing.JList list, javax.swing.JTextField patientNumberExamPanelField, javax.swing.JComboBox examinationTypeSelection, com.toedter.calendar.JDateChooser examinationDateField)
      this function is used to put the information of an Examen object in the graphic field
      The index of the row selected in the graphic list is registered, if the result of the selected index equals -1 the function isn't executed The Examen stored at the selected index is extracted from the temporaryList The information are dispatched in the related graphic fields component

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Method Detail

      • creatExamination

        public static void creatExamination(javax.swing.JList listExaminationPanel,
                                    javax.swing.JList switchRoomAndExaminationList,
                                    java.util.ArrayList<Patient> arrayPatient,
                                    java.util.ArrayList<Examen> arrayExamination,
                                    javax.swing.JTextField patientNumberExamPanelField,
                                    javax.swing.JComboBox examinationTypeSelection,
                                    com.toedter.calendar.JDateChooser examinationDateField)
        this function is used to create an Examen object
        before the creation of the Examen all the field are check then the Patient for whom this Examen is instantiate is extract from the arrayPatient The examination's informations are displayed in the JList Finally the fields are cleared automatically of the previous informations
        Parameters:
        listExaminationPanel - : Graphic list component displaying the informations from the Examen objects existing in arrayExamination
        switchRoomAndExaminationList - : Graphic list component switching display informations between Examen objects and Chambre object
        arrayPatient - : used to keep the Patient object extracted from external file or created by the user
        arrayExamination - : used to keep the Examen object extracted from external file or created by the user
        patientNumberExamPanelField - : display the id of the Patient for whom the Examen will be affected
        examinationTypeSelection - : display a list of several type of examination
        examinationDateField - : Graphic component input JDate field, the user can change the value of this field
        See Also:
        ExaminationControler.inputFieldControler(javax.swing.JTextField, javax.swing.JComboBox, com.toedter.calendar.JDateChooser), PatientFunction.extractPatientFromArray(java.util.ArrayList<com.objectsPackage.Patient>, int), ExaminationControler.inputFieldControler(JComboBox, JDateChooser), ParseFunctions.dateFormating(com.toedter.calendar.JDateChooser), Examen.Examen(Patient, Chambre, String, String), cancelInformationBeforeAddExamination

      • cancelInformationBeforeAddExamination

        public static void cancelInformationBeforeAddExamination(com.toedter.calendar.JDateChooser examinationDateField,
                                                         javax.swing.JTextField patientNumberExamPanelField,
                                                         javax.swing.JComboBox examinationTypeSelection)
        this function is used to all the field of the following parameters
        Parameters:
        examinationDateField - : Graphic component input JDate field, the user can change the value of this field
        patientNumberExamPanelField - : display the id of the Patient for whom the Examen will be affected
        examinationTypeSelection - : display a list of several type of examination

      • searchExamination

        public static void searchExamination(javax.swing.JList list,
                                     java.util.ArrayList<Examen> arrayExamination,
                                     javax.swing.JTextField searchExaminationField)
        this function is used to look for informations related to Examen objects
        Clearing the temporaryList is needed before each research A loop is used to check in each Examen object if the key work is registered in the fields If a result is found the Examen is stored in the temporaryList Finally the result is shown by the JList if the temporaryList is empty there is no results so it display the informations of the arrayExamination else it display the result(s) stored in the temporaryList
        Parameters:
        list - : Graphic list component displaying the informations from the Examen objects existing in arrayExamination
        arrayExamination - : used to keep the Examen object extracted from external file or created by the user
        searchExaminationField - : field available for the user to search for informations related to Examen object

      • showExamination

        public static void showExamination(javax.swing.JList list,
                                   java.util.ArrayList<Examen> arrayExamination,
                                   javax.swing.JTextField patientNumberExamPanelField,
                                   javax.swing.JComboBox examinationTypeSelection,
                                   com.toedter.calendar.JDateChooser examinationDateField)
        this function is used to put the information of an Examen object in the graphic field
        The function used is related to the state of the temporaryList if the temporaryList is empty showExaminationFromArrayExamination() if put in action else showExaminationFronTemporaryList() is used
        Parameters:
        list - : Graphic list component displaying the informations from the Examen objects existing in arrayExamination
        arrayExamination - : used to keep the Examen object extracted from external file or created by the user
        patientNumberExamPanelField - : display the id of the Patient for whom the Examen will be affected
        examinationTypeSelection - : display a list of several type of examination
        examinationDateField - : Graphic component input JDate field, the user can change the value of this field
        See Also:
        showExaminationFromArrayExamination, showExaminationFronTemporaryList

                                     javax.swing.JList switchRoomAndExaminationList,
                                     javax.swing.JList bookedList)
        this function is used to delete an Examen
        The function used is related to the state of the temporaryList if the temporaryList is empty deleteFromArrayExamination() if put in action else deleteFromTemporaryList() is used
        Parameters:
        list - : Graphic list component displaying the informations from the Examen objects existing in arrayExamination
        arrayExamination - : used to keep the Examen object extracted from external file or created by the user
        patientNumberExamPanelField - : display the id of the Patient for whom the Examen will be affected
        examinationTypeSelection - : display a list of several type of examination
        examinationDateField - : Graphic component input JDate field, the user can change the value of this field
        switchRoomAndExaminationList - : Graphic list component switching display informations between Examen objects and Chambre object

      • showExaminationFromArrayExamination

        private static void showExaminationFromArrayExamination(javax.swing.JList list,
                                                        java.util.ArrayList<Examen> arrayExamination,
                                                        javax.swing.JTextField patientNumberExamPanelField,
                                                        javax.swing.JComboBox examinationTypeSelection,
                                                        com.toedter.calendar.JDateChooser examinationDateField)
        this function is used to put the information of an Examen object in the graphic field
        If the result of the selected index equals -1 the isn't executed the Examen stored at the selected index is extracted from the arrayExamination the information are dispatched in the related graphic fields component

      • showExaminationFronTemporaryList

        private static void showExaminationFronTemporaryList(javax.swing.JList list,
                                                     javax.swing.JTextField patientNumberExamPanelField,
                                                     javax.swing.JComboBox examinationTypeSelection,
                                                     com.toedter.calendar.JDateChooser examinationDateField)
        this function is used to put the information of an Examen object in the graphic field
        The index of the row selected in the graphic list is registered, if the result of the selected index equals -1 the function isn't executed The Examen stored at the selected index is extracted from the temporaryList The information are dispatched in the related graphic fields component
        Parameters:
        list - : Graphic list component displaying the informations from the Examen objects existing in arrayExamination
        patientNumberExamPanelField - : display the id of the Patient for whom the Examen will be affected

        examinationDateField - : Graphic component input JDate field, the user can change the value of this field

      • deleteFromArrayExamination

        private static void deleteFromArrayExamination(javax.swing.JList list,
                                               java.util.ArrayList<Examen> arrayExamination,
                                               javax.swing.JTextField patientNumberExamPanelField,
                                               javax.swing.JComboBox examinationTypeSelection,
                                               com.toedter.calendar.JDateChooser examinationDateField,
                                               javax.swing.JList switchRoomAndExaminationList,
                                               javax.swing.JList bookedList)
        this function is used to delete an Examen
        The index of the row selected in the graphic list is registered, if the result of the selected index equals -1 the function isn't executed Before deleting an Examen it is imperative to check if a Chambre has already been booked for this one 
                        If no room has been booked :
                        - The the selected index is used to remove the Examen stored in the index of the arrayExamination
                        - The RoomFunction.updadeExaminationListForBooking() is used
                
        
                Else if a room has been registered
                        - The room is cloned 
                        - The  RoomFunction.resetRoomDataToDefault() is put in action
                        - The the selected index is used to remove the Examen stored in the index of the arrayExamination
                        - The  RoomFunction.updadeExaminationListForBooking() is used 
                        - The  RoomFunction.printRoomInList() is used too
        After that the fields are cleared The updated arrayExamination is displayed in the graphic list
        Parameters:
        list - : Graphic list component displaying the informations from the Examen objects existing in arrayExamination
        arrayExamination - : used to keep the Examen object extracted from external file or created by the user
        patientNumberExamPanelField - : display the id of the Patient for whom the Examen will be affected
        examinationTypeSelection - : display a list of several type of examination
        examinationDateField - : Graphic component input JDate field, the user can change the value of this field
        switchRoomAndExaminationList - : Graphic list component switching display informations between Examen objects and Chambre object
        bookedList - : Graphic list componant displaying the informations from the booked Chambre object
        See Also:
        RoomFunction.updadeExaminationListForBooking(javax.swing.JList, java.util.ArrayList<com.objectsPackage.Examen>), RoomFunction.resetRoomDataToDefault(com.objectsPackage.Chambre), RoomFunction.printRoomInList(javax.swing.JList, java.util.ArrayList<com.objectsPackage.Chambre>), cancelInformationBeforeAddExamination

      • deleteFromTemporaryList

        private static void deleteFromTemporaryList(javax.swing.JList list,
                                            java.util.ArrayList<Examen> arrayExamination,
                                            javax.swing.JTextField patientNumberExamPanelField,
                                            javax.swing.JComboBox examinationTypeSelection,
                                            com.toedter.calendar.JDateChooser examinationDateField,
                                            javax.swing.JList switchRoomAndExaminationList,
                                            javax.swing.JList bookedList)
        this function is used to delete an Examen
        The index of the row selected in the graphic list is registered, if the result of the selected index equals -1 the function isn't executed The Examen at the selected index is extracted of the temporaryList A loop is used to check all the Examen stored in the arrayExamination The value of all Examen are checked and to find the one selected by the user After it has been found and before deleting it, it is imperative to check if a Chambre has already been booked for this one 
                        If no room has been booked :
                        - The selected index is used to remove the Examen stored in the index of the arrayExamination
                        - The RoomFunction.updadeExaminationListForBooking() is used
                
        
                Else if a room has been registered
                        - The room is cloned 
                        - The  RoomFunction.resetRoomDataToDefault() is put in action
                        - The the selected index is used to remove the Examen stored in the index of the arrayExamination
                        - The  RoomFunction.updadeExaminationListForBooking() is used 
                        - The  RoomFunction.printRoomInList() is used too
        The Examen at the selected index is removed of the temporaryList After that the fields are cleared The updated arrayExamination is displayed in the graphic list
        Parameters:
        list - : Graphic list component displaying the informations from the Examen objects existing in arrayExamination
        arrayExamination - : used to keep the Examen object extracted from external file or created by the user
        patientNumberExamPanelField - : display the id of the Patient for whom the Examen will be affected
        examinationTypeSelection - : display a list of several type of examination
        examinationDateField - : Graphic component input JDate field, the user can change the value of this field
        switchRoomAndExaminationList - : Graphic list component switching display informations between Examen objects and Chambre object
        bookedList - : Graphic list componant displaying the informations from the booked Chambre object
        See Also:
        RoomFunction.updadeExaminationListForBooking(javax.swing.JList, java.util.ArrayList<com.objectsPackage.Examen>), RoomFunction.resetRoomDataToDefault(com.objectsPackage.Chambre), RoomFunction.printRoomInList(javax.swing.JList, java.util.ArrayList<com.objectsPackage.Chambre>), cancelInformationBeforeAddExamination

      • changeInfoExaminationFronArrayExamination

        private static void changeInfoExaminationFronArrayExamination(javax.swing.JList list,
                                                              java.util.ArrayList<Examen> arrayExamination,
                                                              java.util.ArrayList<Patient> arrayPatient,
                                                              javax.swing.JTextField patientNumberExamPanelField,
                                                              javax.swing.JComboBox examinationTypeSelection,
                                                              com.toedter.calendar.JDateChooser examinationDateField)
        this function is used to change the informations of an Examen from the arrayExamination
        The index of the row selected in the graphic list is registered, if the result of the selected index equals -1 the function isn't executed The informations in the fields are checked Then the Examen stored at the selected index in the arrayExamination is extracted and it's values udpated Finally the updated arrayExamination is displayed in the JList
        Parameters:
        list - : Graphic list component displaying the informations from the Examen objects existing in arrayExamination
        arrayExamination - : used to keep the Examen object extracted from external file or created by the user
        arrayPatient - : used to keep the Patient object extracted from external file or created by the user
        patientNumberExamPanelField - : display the id of the Patient for whom the Examen will be affected
        examinationTypeSelection - : display a list of several type of examination
        examinationDateField - : Graphic component input JDate field, the user can change the value of this field
        See Also:
        ExaminationControler.inputFieldControler(JTextField, JComboBox, JDateChooser), ParseFunctions.numericConversion(java.lang.String), ExaminationControler.inputFieldControler(JComboBox, JDateChooser), ParseFunctions.dateFormating(com.toedter.calendar.JDateChooser)

      • changeInfoExaminationFromTemporaryList

        private static void changeInfoExaminationFromTemporaryList(javax.swing.JList list,
                                                           java.util.ArrayList<Examen> arrayExamination,
                                                           java.util.ArrayList<Patient> arrayPatient,
                                                           javax.swing.JTextField patientNumberExamPanelField,
                                                           javax.swing.JComboBox examinationTypeSelection,
                                                           com.toedter.calendar.JDateChooser examinationDateField)
        this function is used to change the informations of an Examen from the temporaryList
        The index of the row selected in the graphic list is registered, if the result of the selected index equals -1 the function isn't executed The informations in the fields are checked Then the Examen stored at the selected index in the temporaryList is extracted and it's values updated The temporaryList is cleared Finally the updated arrayExamination is displayed in the JList
        Parameters:
        list - : Graphic list component displaying the informations from the Examen objects existing in arrayExamination
        arrayExamination - : used to keep the Examen object extracted from external file or created by the user

        See Also:
        ExaminationControler.inputFieldControler(JTextField, JComboBox, JDateChooser), ParseFunctions.numericConversion(String), ExaminationControler.inputFieldControler(JComboBox, JDateChooser), ParseFunctions.dateFormating(String)

      • extractExaminationFromArray

        public static Examen extractExaminationFromArray(java.util.ArrayList<Examen> arrayExamination,
                                                 int idP)
        this function is used extract an Examen from arrayExamination with only the ID of the Patient
        In a loop when the id Patient is found the loop is stopped The examination is returned
        Parameters:
        arrayExamination - : used to keep the Examen object extracted from external file or created by the user
        idP - : is the value of a specific id from a Patient
        Returns:
        an Object Examen

      • extractExaminationFromArray

        public static Examen extractExaminationFromArray(java.util.ArrayList<Examen> arrayExamination,
                                                 int idP,
                                                 java.lang.String examinationType,
                                                 java.lang.String examinationDate)
        this function is used extract an Examen from arrayExamination with only the ID of the Patient
        In a loop when the id Patient, the type of examination and the date of the examination are found the loop is stopped The examination is returned
        Parameters:
        arrayExamination - : used to keep the Examen object extracted from external file or created by the user
        idP - : is the value of a specific id from a Patient
        examinationType - : store the type of examination
        examinationDate - : store the date of the examination
        Returns:
        an Object Examen
